scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run dev & open http://localhost:5173/"
scripts.dev-client: cd client && npm run dev & open http://localhost:5173/
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
